meanings.definition: Continue firmly or obstinately in an opinion or a course of action in spite of difficulty, opposition, or failure.
meanings.sent1: She would persist in her belief despite others disagreeing.
meanings.sent2: Despite the challenges, he decided to persist with his plan.
meanings.sent3: The little squirrel persisted in trying to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His determination to persist through the storm inspired others.
meanings.sent5: The image of the marathon runner persisting to the finish line stayed with her.

meanings.sent1: The old traditions persist in the small village.
meanings.sent2: The smell of fresh cookies persisted in the kitchen all day.
meanings.sent3: The rumor about the ghost persisting in the old mansion amused the children.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of nostalgia persisted long after the event ended.
meanings.sent5: The melody of the song persisted in her mind, bringing back memories.
